extractedQuotes.text: The golden age of America begins right now.
I was saved by God to make America great again.
For American citizens, January 20th, 2025, is Liberation Day.
The vicious, violent and unfair weaponization of the Justice Department and our government will end.

transcripts.speaker: Donald Trump
transcripts.title: Executive Order: Protecting The American People Against Invasion

extractedQuotes.text: The prior administration invited, administered, and oversaw an unprecedented flood of illegal immigration.
This is an invasion that must be stopped.
We have the outside enemy, and then we have the enemy from within. And the enemy from within, in my opinion, is more dangerous than China, Russia and all these countries.
They're poisoning the blood of our country. That's what they've done. They poison mental institutions and prisons all over the world.
They're not people, in my opinion. These are animals, and we have to stop them.
In Springfield, they're eating the dogs. They're eating the cats. They're eating the pets of the people that live there.
We pledge to you that we will root out the communists, Marxists, fascists and the radical left thugs that live like vermin within the confines of our country.
If I don't get elected, it's going to be a bloodbath for the country.
I want to be a dictator for one day.
A Massive Fraud of this type and magnitude allows for the termination of all rules, regulations, and articles, even those found in the Constitution.
I am your retribution.
Many of them murdered far more than one person, and they're now happily living in the United States. You know, now, a murderer — I believe this — it's in their genes.
We fight like hell. And if you don't fight like hell, you're not going to have a country anymore.
We won this election, and we won it by a landslide.

factCheck.source: AP Fact Check, PolitiFact, 62 court rulings

extractedQuotes.text: I just want to find 11,780 votes.
President Trump is deploying a multifaceted approach to ending migrant crime, sealing the southern border, repelling the invasion, and shutting down trafficking networks.
The objective is to get high-threat criminal aliens out of the United States, put them into a facility that is safe and secure, and then find an ultimate and final destination for those aliens.
Now that we have achieved the mission of sealing the border, you're going to see more and more resources and priorities put into the mass deportation program.
The Constitution is clear that the privilege of the writ of habeas corpus can be suspended in a time of invasion. So, it's an option we're actively looking at.
The 'invasion force' were the 20 MILLION illegal aliens that Biden flooded into this country!
They refused to turn over tens of thousands of serial criminal illegal aliens to ICE — they get cut loose.
Guantanamo Bay is a pillar of this administration's plan to deal with and remove high threat criminal aliens, as well as to increase and expand our overall detention capacity.
This is the largest domestic law enforcement operation in the history of the world.
The Democrats wanted open borders, they got open borders, and now they're seeing the consequences.
Every sanctuary city is a sanctuary for criminals. Every sanctuary state is a sanctuary for criminals.
These are enemy combatants who have invaded our country. They will be treated as such.
I think the cosmopolitan bias against working-class Americans is one of the ugliest forms of bigotry in this country.
The No. 1 threat to our homeland security is our southern border.
During President Biden's administration, we've seen 382 individuals that have come over that border that are on the terrorist watch list.
We need to focus on domestic terrorism. Homegrown terrorism is on the rise.
We will repel this invasion. We will restore law and order. We will make our communities safe again.
Mass deportation is not just a policy, it's a necessity for the survival of this nation.
I shot the dog because she was untrainable and dangerous.
Joe Biden created the worst border crisis in American history. We're going to fix it.
Criminal aliens are terrorizing communities across America. We will find them and we will remove them.
We will never give up. We will never concede. It doesn't happen. You don't concede when there's theft involved.

factCheck.source: 62 court cases, CISA, state election officials

extractedQuotes.text: We're going to walk down to the Capitol, and we're going to cheer on our brave senators and congressmen and women.
I know that everyone here will soon be marching over to the Capitol building to peacefully and patriotically make your voices heard.
Let's have trial by combat!
You had some very bad people in that group, but you also had people that were very fine people, on both sides.
Why don't they go back and help fix the totally broken and crime infested places from which they came.
If a city or state refuses to take the actions necessary to defend the life and property of their residents, then I will deploy the United States military and quickly solve the problem for them.
When the looting starts, the shooting starts.
The FAKE NEWS media is not my enemy, it is the enemy of the American People!
Any negative polls are fake news.
A big name of the game is deterrence.
It's a very simple decision. Don't come here illegally. If you come here legally, we'll welcome you.
The message is that no one is exempt from immigration law.
This is their new hoax.
It's going to disappear. One day — it's like a miracle — it will disappear.
And then I see the disinfectant, where it knocks it out in a minute. One minute. And is there a way we can do something like that, by injection inside or almost a cleaning?
We have it totally under control. It's one person coming in from China.
They were hostages. They are now free.
These are great patriots who have been treated very unfairly.
We are effectively run in this country by a bunch of childless cat ladies who are miserable at their own lives.
Reports now show that people have had their pets abducted and eaten by people who shouldn't be in this country.

factCheck.source: PolitiFact (2024 Lie of the Year), Springfield officials

extractedQuotes.text: If I have to create stories so that the American media actually pays attention to the suffering of the American people, then that's what I'm going to do.
The Democrats, they hate normal Americans.
I think Trump is America's Hitler.
I'm a Never Trump guy. I never liked him.
Trump is cultural heroin. He makes people feel good for a little while, but he's not going to fix what's broken.
We have an invasion at our southern border. It's the biggest invasion in American history.
There are too many coincidences to ignore. The Rothschilds and their space laser started the fires.
It's a false flag planned shooting. Crisis actors were used.
She's a traitor to our country. She's guilty of treason.
She liked a post calling for Pelosi to be executed.
We have Nancy Pelosi's gazpacho police spying on members of Congress.
They're growing meat in a peach tree dish.
We need a national divorce. We need to separate by red states and blue states.
Dr. Fauci belongs in prison. He created COVID-19.
We have a Second Amendment in this country, and I think we have an obligation to use it.
Silicon Valley oligarchs are trying to steal our democracy.
Some of the people who breached the Capitol were not Trump supporters. They were Antifa.
The deep state is real. They're trying to destroy President Trump.
Kevin McCarthy sold us out. He made a deal with the Democrats.
The Department of Justice has been completely weaponized against conservatives.
The FBI has been weaponized against the American people.
There's a censorship industrial complex between big tech and the government.
The Twitter Files prove the government was censoring Americans.
How many FBI agents were in the crowd on January 6th?
The Biden family has received millions from foreign nationals. This is corruption.
There's a two-tier system of justice in this country. One for Democrats and one for Republicans.
We pledge to you that we will root out the communists, Marxists, fascists and the radical left thugs that live like vermin within the confines of our country.

extractedQuotes.text: Why are we having all these people from shithole countries come here?

extractedQuotes.text: When Mexico sends its people, they're not sending their best. They're bringing drugs. They're bringing crime. They're rapists.

extractedQuotes.text: Baltimore, a disgusting, rat and rodent infested mess. No human being would want to live there.

extractedQuotes.text: Many of them murdered far more than one person, and they're now happily living in the United States. You know now, a murderer, I believe this, it's in their genes. And we got a lot of bad genes in our country right now.
extractedQuotes.speaker: Donald Trump

factCheck.source: Scientific consensus rejects genetic criminality theories - this echoes eugenics

extractedQuotes.text: We will build massive holding facilities and we will not stop until every last illegal alien is returned to their country.

quote1.text: I think Trump is America's Hitler.

quote2.text: President Trump is the greatest president of my lifetime.

quote1.text: I'm a Never Trump guy. I never liked him.

quote2.text: I am honored to be President Trump's running mate.

quote1.text: I'm going to drain the swamp.

quote2.text: I hate the term 'drain the swamp.' I thought it was so hokey.

quote1.text: I love WikiLeaks!

quote2.text: I know nothing about WikiLeaks. It's not my thing.

quote1.text: I'm going to be working for you. I'm not going to have time to go play golf.

quote2.text: Exercise is bad for you. Golf is my exercise.

quote1.text: I will eliminate the national debt in 8 years.

quote2.text: Who cares about the deficit? I won't be here when it blows up.

quote1.text: Russia, if you're listening, I hope you're able to find the 30,000 emails.

quote2.text: I have nothing to do with Russia. The Russia story is a hoax.

quote1.text: I know that everyone here will soon be marching over to the Capitol building to peacefully and patriotically make your voices heard.

quote2.text: These were peaceful people. These were great people.

quote1.text: If you come here legally, we'll welcome you.

quote2.text: We need to dramatically reduce legal immigration.

quote1.text: Lock her up! Lock her up!

quote2.text: I didn't say 'lock her up,' but the people said 'lock her up, lock her up.' I could have done it, but I felt it would have been a terrible thing.

quote1.text: I will have that war settled in one day, 24 hours.

quote2.text: Obviously, people know that when I said that, it was said in jest.

quote1.text: The electoral college is a disaster for a democracy.

quote2.text: The Electoral College is actually genius in that it brings all states, including the smaller ones, into play.

quote1.text: I certainly would like abortion to be illegal nationally.

quote2.text: I never supported a national ban.

quote1.text: The Affordable Care Act extended health care to many people who were previously uncovered.

quote2.text: The Affordable Care Act is a disaster. We need to repeal it.

quote1.text: I support red flag laws to keep guns out of the hands of dangerous people.

quote2.text: Red flag laws are unconstitutional attacks on the Second Amendment.

contradictions.speaker: Donald Trump

quote1.text: TikTok's data collection could allow China's government to track the locations of Federal employees and contractors, build dossiers of personal information for blackmail, and conduct corporate espionage.

quote2.text: Frankly, there are a lot of people on TikTok that love it. There are a lot of young kids on TikTok who will go crazy without it. Without TikTok, you can make Facebook bigger, and I consider Facebook to be an enemy of the people.

contradictions.context: Trump signed an executive order to ban TikTok in 2020 citing national security. In 2024, after joining TikTok and receiving 36 billion views, he reversed position. PolitiFact rated this a 'Full Flop.'

contradictions.speaker: Donald Trump

quote1.text: I know nothing about Project 2025. I have no idea who's behind it. I disagree with some of the things they're saying, and some of the things they're saying are absolutely ridiculous and abysmal.

quote2.text: I have a meeting today with Russ Vought, he of PROJECT 2025 Fame, to determine which of the many Democrat Agencies, most of which are a political SCAM, he recommends to be cut.

contradictions.context: Trump repeatedly denied knowing about Project 2025 during the campaign. After winning, he announced meetings with its architects. An independent tracker reports 48% of Project 2025 proposals have been implemented.

contradictions.speaker: Marco Rubio

quote1.text: Donald Trump is a con man. He's dangerous. He's unqualified to control the nation's nuclear codes. He will fracture the Republican Party.

quote2.text: I'm honored to serve President Trump as Secretary of State. He has the vision America needs.

contradictions.context: Rubio called Trump a 'lunatic' and 'con man' in 2016, mocked his 'small hands,' and said he would 'fracture' the GOP. He later endorsed Trump and became his Secretary of State.

contradictions.speaker: JD Vance

quote1.text: Trump is cultural heroin. He makes people feel good for a little while, but he's not going to fix what's broken.

quote2.text: I was wrong about President Trump. He was a great president. And it's one of the reasons why I'm working so hard to make sure he gets a second term.
quote2.source: Fox News Interview after VP Selection

contradictions.context: Vance called Trump 'loathsome,' 'noxious,' 'reprehensible,' and compared him to 'heroin' and 'Hitler' in 2016. After receiving Trump's endorsement for Senate in 2022, he became a fervent supporter.

contradictions.speaker: RFK Jr

quote1.text: There's no vaccine that is safe and effective.

quote2.text: I am pro-vaccine. I am going to support the vaccine program. I support the measles vaccine, I support the polio vaccine. I will do nothing as HHS secretary that makes it difficult or discourages people from taking either of those vaccines.

contradictions.context: Kennedy founded Children's Health Defense, an anti-vaccine group. He was identified as one of the 'Disinformation Dozen' responsible for 65% of anti-vaccine content online. At his confirmation hearing, he claimed to be 'pro-vaccine.' He later fired the entire CDC vaccine advisory panel.

contradictions.speaker: RFK Jr

quote1.text: I will do nothing as HHS secretary that makes it difficult or discourages people from taking vaccines.

quote2.text: HHS issued guidance to no longer recommend COVID-19 vaccines for children and during pregnancy.

contradictions.context: Kennedy promised not to restrict vaccine access during confirmation. Within months, he fired the entire 17-member CDC vaccine advisory panel and replaced them with vaccine skeptics, issued guidance against childhood COVID vaccines, and was sued by major health groups.

contradictions.speaker: Tulsi Gabbard

quote1.text: Edward Snowden is a brave whistleblower who deserves clemency. He exposed the unconstitutional surveillance of the American people.

quote2.text: Edward Snowden broke the law. I would not as head of the DNI support clemency for him.

contradictions.context: Gabbard repeatedly praised Snowden as a 'brave' whistleblower who deserved a pardon. At her DNI confirmation hearing, she reversed and said he 'broke the law' and would not support clemency.

contradictions.speaker: Tulsi Gabbard

quote1.text: Section 702 represents overreach by intelligence agencies and is a violation of Americans' civil liberties. We must repeal it.

quote2.text: Section 702, unlike other FISA authorities, is crucial for gathering foreign intelligence on non-U.S. persons abroad. This unique capability cannot be replicated and must be safeguarded.

contradictions.context: As a Democratic congresswoman, Gabbard voted against Section 702 every time and proposed legislation to repeal it. At her DNI confirmation, she reversed and called it 'crucial.' Patrick Eddington of Cato Institute called it a 'volte-face.'

contradictions.speaker: Pete Hegseth

quote1.text: I'm straight up just saying we should not have women in combat roles. It hasn't made us more effective, hasn't made us more lethal, has made fighting more complicated.

quote2.text: I'm not against women in combat jobs. Anyone who can meet the standards should be allowed to serve.

contradictions.context: Hegseth stated weeks before his nomination that women 'should not' be in combat. At confirmation, he softened his stance. As Defense Secretary, he fired multiple female military leaders and ordered a review of women's 'readiness' in combat roles.

contradictions.speaker: Elon Musk

quote1.text: I am a free speech absolutist. I think that people should be allowed to say pretty outrageous things.

quote2.text: Twitter withheld access to tweets by journalist Saurav Das globally in response to legal demand from the Indian government.

contradictions.context: Musk proclaimed himself a 'free speech absolutist' when buying Twitter. Under his ownership, X complied with 71% of government content removal requests vs 18% under prior management. He suspended journalists, throttled competitors, and banned content globally at India's request.

contradictions.speaker: Elon Musk

quote1.text: Government should not be picking winners and losers. Let the market decide. End all subsidies.

quote2.text: Musk's companies have received over $38 billion in U.S. government support since 2003 via contracts, subsidies, and tax credits. In 2024 alone, federal and local governments provided at least $6.3 billion to Musk's companies.
quote2.source: Built In / Economic Policy Institute Analysis

contradictions.context: Musk advocated ending government subsidies while leading DOGE to cut spending. His companies receive more government money than almost any individual in history. DOGE cut contracts for other vendors but none for Musk's companies. His companies collect $5 for every $1 DOGE proposes to cut.

contradictions.speaker: Kristi Noem

quote1.text: Alex Pretti approached Border Patrol agents with a gun and violently resisted after officers tried to disarm him. He was wishing to inflict harm on them.

quote2.text: The scene was chaotic. We issued public statements based on the best information we had at the time.

contradictions.context: Noem claimed Pretti 'attacked' officers and wanted to 'massacre law enforcement.' Video showed officers pinned Pretti down and removed a gun from his waist before shooting. A DHS official said: 'When we gaslight and contradict what the public can plainly see, we lose all credibility.'
